# vx

> Universal Development Tool Manager — One command to rule them all with zero setup and zero learning curve.

vx is a Rust-based tool manager that automatically installs and manages development tools. Built for the AI-native era following Unix Philosophy and Scriptability principles, it enables developers and AI agents to use any tool without environment setup.

- **Install**: `curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/loonghao/vx/main/install.sh | bash` (Linux/macOS) or `irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/loonghao/vx/main/install.ps1 | iex` (Windows)
- **Platforms**: Windows, macOS, Linux
- **Rust**: 1.83+
- **License**: MIT
- **Repository**: https://github.com/loonghao/vx
- **Releases**: https://github.com/loonghao/vx/releases

## Key Features

- **Zero Learning Curve**: Use existing commands with `vx` prefix — no new syntax to learn
- **Auto-Install on First Use**: Tools are automatically downloaded and installed when first invoked
- **Multi-Language Support**: Node.js, Python, Go, Rust, Java, Zig, Deno, Bun, and more
- **Project Configuration**: Define tool versions in `vx.toml` for reproducible environments
- **Team Synchronization**: One-command setup with `vx setup` for team onboarding
- **MCP Integration**: Works seamlessly with Model Context Protocol for AI assistants
- **Shell Integration**: Native support for bash, zsh, fish, and PowerShell
- **35+ Providers**: Built-in support for 35+ development tools and growing
- **Cross-Platform**: Consistent experience across Windows, macOS, and Linux
- **Scriptable**: Full CI/CD integration with headless mode support

## Technical Stack

- **Core**: Rust 1.83+ with async/await (tokio)
- **HTTP**: reqwest with rustls-tls (pure Rust, no OpenSSL)
- **Configuration**: figment with TOML support
- **CLI**: clap for argument parsing
- **Logging**: tracing ecosystem for structured logging

## Quick Start

### Installation

```bash
# Linux/macOS
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/loonghao/vx/main/install.sh | bash

# Windows (PowerShell)
irm https://raw.githubusercontent.com/loonghao/vx/main/install.ps1 | iex
```

### Basic Usage

```bash
# Run any tool - auto-installs if needed
vx node --version
vx npm install
vx npx create-react-app my-app
vx go version
vx cargo build
vx uvx ruff check .
```

### Project Setup

```bash
# Initialize project configuration
vx init

# Install all project tools
vx setup

# Enter development shell
vx dev

# Run project scripts
vx run dev
vx run test
```

### vx.toml Configuration

```toml
[project]
name = "my-project"

[tools]
node = "20"
python = "3.12"
uv = "latest"
go = "1.21"

[settings]
auto_install = true
parallel_install = true

[env]
NODE_ENV = "development"

[scripts]
dev = "npm run dev"
test = "npm test && cargo test"
lint = "uvx ruff check ."
```

## Core API

### Provider Trait

```rust
#[async_trait]
pub trait Provider: Send + Sync {
    fn info(&self) -> ProviderInfo;
    async fn list_versions(&self) -> Result<Vec<String>>;
    async fn install(&self, version: &str) -> Result<()>;
    fn get_runtime(&self, version: &str) -> Result<RuntimeInfo>;
}
```

### RuntimeSpec

```rust
pub struct RuntimeSpec {
    pub name: String,
    pub description: String,
    pub aliases: Vec<String>,
    pub dependencies: Vec<RuntimeDependency>,
    pub executable: Option<String>,
    pub command_prefix: Vec<String>,
    pub ecosystem: Ecosystem,
}
```

### PathManager

```rust
impl PathManager {
    pub fn version_store_dir(&self, tool: &str, version: &str) -> PathBuf;
    pub fn env_dir(&self, name: &str) -> PathBuf;
    pub fn cache_dir(&self) -> PathBuf;
    pub fn list_store_versions(&self, tool: &str) -> Result<Vec<String>>;
}
```

- [vx install](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/install.md): Install tools

- [vx test](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/test.md): Test framework

- [vx shell](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/cli/shell.md): Shell integration

## Supported Tools

### Language Runtimes

- [Node.js](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/nodejs.md): node, npm, npx
- [Python](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/python.md): uv, uvx, python
- [Go](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/go.md): go toolchain
- [Rust](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/rust.md): cargo, rustc, rustup

### Package Managers

- Bun (bun, bunx)
- Deno
- pnpm (pnpm, pnpx)
- Yarn

### Build Tools

- [Build Tools](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/build-tools.md): cmake, ninja, just, task, make, meson, protoc, nasm

### DevOps & Cloud

- [DevOps](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/devops.md): terraform, kubectl, helm, docker
- [Cloud CLI](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/cloud.md): aws, az, gcloud

### Other Tools

- [AI Tools](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/ai.md): ollama
- [Media Tools](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/media.md): ffmpeg, imagemagick
- [Code Quality](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/quality.md): pre-commit
- [Scientific](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/scientific.md): spack
- [Other](https://github.com/loonghao/vx/blob/main/docs/tools/other.md): jq, gh, vscode, rez, rcedit
